name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms / 三國志
description: Romance of the Three Kingdoms was first released in 1985. It was the first Japanese game to be based on the Chinese classic "Romance of the Three Kingdoms." Players become the leaders of their countries and strive to unite the land under their rule.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over Storage: 30 MB available space Sound Card: 22KHz/16bit
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over Storage: 30 MB available space Sound Card: 22KHz/16bit
